Pre-Game Insights: Shohei Ohtani is expected to receive a warm ovation from Angels fans despite playing for the Dodgers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Shohei Ohtani's return to Angel Stadium will be his first regular-season appearance as a visiting player.
The Dodgers have a healthy division lead after taking three of four games from the Arizona Diamondbacks.
Others: The Angels' decision to decline the $700 million offer to Shohei Ohtani is still a topic of discussion among fans and former teammates.
Shohei Ohtani's decision to leave the Angels and sign with the Dodgers is seen as a pivotal moment in his career.
